configuration:
mapred.job.tracker <%= @master_ip %>:4040
mapred.local.dir /space/hadoop/mapred/local true
mapred.temp.dir /space/hadoop/mapred/temp true
mapred.map.tasks 80
mapred.reduce.tasks 16
mapred.userlog.retain.hours 8
<% if node.hue.enabled %>
jobtracker.thrift.address 0.0.0.0:9290
mapred.jobtracker.plugins org.apache.hadoop.thriftfs.ThriftJobTrackerPlugin Comma-separated list of jobtracker plug-ins to be activated.
<% end %>
